Thu Dec 28 03:01:35 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/bin
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/pass-1.7.4/bin/pass /opt/bin//pass
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/lib
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/lib//password-store
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/lib//password-store/extensions
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share//bash-completion
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share//bash-completion/completions
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share//fish
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share//fish/vendor_completions.d
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share//man
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share//man/man1
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share//zsh
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share//zsh/site-functions
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/pass-1.7.4/share/bash-completion/completions/pass /opt/share//bash-completion/completions/pass
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/pass-1.7.4/share/fish/vendor_completions.d/pass.fish /opt/share//fish/vendor_completions.d/pass.fish
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/pass-1.7.4/share/man/man1/pass.1 /opt/share//man/man1/pass.1
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/pass-1.7.4/share/zsh/site-functions/_pass /opt/share//zsh/site-functions/_pass
